param.name: koverall_total
param.description: Total number of timesteps. For IGCM, where dt is usually 1 hour, use koverall_total=8640 for a 1 year run. For embm/goldstein where dt is usually 365.25/500 days, use koverall_total=500 for a 1 year run.

param.name: gem_adapt_dpCO2dt
param.description: rate-of-change threshold for switching into GEMlite (ppm yr-1)

param.name: gem_adapt_DpCO2
param.description: cumulative pCO2 threshold for wtiching out of GEMlite (ppm)

param.name: gem_adapt_diag_biogem_full
param.description: Normal data save, otherwise skip time-series and slice data saving and just update time point?

param.name: dt_write
param.description: Time period of output. For IGCM where dt is usually hours, use dt_write=720 for monthly output. For embm/goldstein, use dt_write=500 for yearly output.

param.name: flag_checkfluxes_sic
param.description: .true. for screen output of energy and water bugets

param.name: flag_checkfluxes_ocn
param.description: .true. for screen output of energy and water bugets

param.name: genie_solar_constant
param.description: Solar constant (incoming solar radiation in units of Watts per metre squared)

param.name: verbosity
param.description: Control over verbosity of logging and messages to screen

param.name: par_carbchem_pH_iterationmax
param.description: pH solution maximum number of iterations

param.name: par_geochem_Tmin
param.description: minimum T used in empirical geochem calculations [default: 0 - 30 C for the Schmidt number empirical fit - see: Wanninkhof et al. [1992]]

param.name: par_geochem_Tmax
param.description: maximum T used in empirical geochem calculations [default: 0 - 30 C for the Schmidt number empirical fit - see: Wanninkhof et al. [1992]]

param.name: par_geochem_Smin
param.description: minimum S used in empirical geochem calculations [not (yet) used -- set as per par_carbchem_Smin]

param.name: par_geochem_Smax
param.description: maximum S used in empirical geochem calculations [not (yet) used -- set as per par_carbchem_Smax]

param.name: par_carbchem_Tmin
param.description: minimum T used in empirical carbchem calculations [default from Mehrbach: 2.0 lte T lte 35 C]

param.name: par_carbchem_Tmax
param.description: maximum T used in empirical carbchem calculations [default from Mehrbach: 2.0 lte T lte 35 C]

param.name: par_carbchem_Smin
param.description: minimum S used in empirical carbchem calculations [default from Mehrbach: 26.0 lte S lte 43 PSU]

param.name: par_carbchem_Smax
param.description: maximum S used in empirical carbchem calculations [default from Mehrbach: 26.0 lte S lte 43 PSU]

param.name: par_grid_lon_offset
param.description: assumed longitudinal offset of the grid

param.name: string_results_ext
param.description: filetype for series output files for GEM modules

param.name: igrid
param.description: igrid (0 = const dsinlat; 1 = const dlat; 2 = igcm)

param.name: xu_wstress
param.description: x wind stress at u point

param.name: yu_wstress
param.description: y wind stress at u point

param.name: xv_wstress
param.description: x wind stress at v point

param.name: yv_wstress
param.description: y wind stress at v point

param.name: npstp
param.description: frequency at which 'health checks' are written to the screen or named output file

param.name: iwstp
param.description: restart period, in timesteps. 500 gives output every 5 years, given nyear=100

param.name: itstp
param.description: frequency at which integral diagnostics are written (as time series)

param.name: ianav
param.description: length of time over which output is averaged (recommended minimum = 1 year for annual average)

param.name: yearlen
param.description: number of days per year embm

param.name: ndta
param.description: Atmosphere/Ocean timestep ratio. i.e. atmosphere has ndta*nyear timesteps per year

param.name: scf
param.description: scl_tau: scales the wind stress to drive correct gyre strengths. Should be same as GOLDSTEIN's value. Plausible range 1 to 3 (dimensionless) Tuned values: 1.6674 (EnKF), 1.1841 (ACCPM), 1.3005 (NSGA-II)

param.name: diffamp(1)
param.description: Temperature eddy diffusion amplitude Plausible range 1.0e6 to 1.0e7 m^2s^-1 Tuned values: 3.7548e6 (EnKF), 2.5839e6 (ACCPM), 3.8687e6 (NSGA-II)

param.name: diffamp(2)
param.description: Moisture eddy diffusion amplitude Plausible range 5.0e4 to 5.0e6 m^2s^-1 Tuned values: 1.7447e6 (EnKF), 1.9337e6 (ACCPM), 1.4779e6 (NSGA-II)

param.name: diffwid
param.description: Width parameter for atmospheric temperature diffusivity: Temperature diffusivity is given by an exponential function with a specified slope and width (see Edwards and Marsh 2005) Plausible range 0.5 to 2 radians Tuned values: 1.3071 (EnKF), 1.9920 (ACCPM), 1.0528 (NGSA-II)

param.name: difflin
param.description: Slope parameter for atmospheric temperature diffusivity: Temperature diffusivity is given by an exponential function with a specified slope and width (see Edwards and Marsh 2005) Plausible range 0.0 to 0.25 (dimensionless) Tuned values: 6.8597e-2 (EnKF), 2.3644e-1 (ACCPM), 2.3652e-1 (NGSA-II)

param.name: betaz(1)
param.description: Zonal temperature advection factor (linear scaling of advective transport term) (Edwards and Marsh 2005) Plausible range 0 to 1 (dimensionless) Tuned values: 6.0357e-2 (EnKF), 8.9163e-2 (ACCPM), 5.0122e-2 (NGSA-II)

param.name: betaz(2)
param.description: Zonal moisture advection factor (linear scaling of advective transport term) (Edwards and Marsh 2005) Plausible range 0 to 1 (dimensionless) Tuned values: 1.3674e-1 (EnKF), 1.4885e-2 (ACCPM), 1.4121e-1 (NGSA-II)

param.name: betam(1)
param.description: Meridional temperature advection factor (linear scaling of advective transport term) (Edwards and Marsh 2005) Always set to zero

param.name: betam(2)
param.description: Meridional moisture advection factor (linear scaling of advective transport term) (Edwards and Marsh 2005) Always set equal to zonal moisture advection factor

param.name: t_co2
param.description: time varying co2 input? set to 1

param.name: nco2
param.description: number of time varying co2 inputs (requires t_co2=1)

param.name: co2steps
param.description: interval (goldstein timesteps) between time varying co2 inputs time varying co2 inputs (requires t_co2=1)

param.name: radfor_scl_co2
param.description: Scaling factor for CO2: scales baseline pre-industrial CO2 of 278 ppm (unless CO2 is overridden elsewhere e.g coupled CO2 or time-varying forced CO2)

param.name: radfor_scl_ch4
param.description: Scaling factor for CH4: scales baseline pre-industrial CH4 of 700 ppb (unless CH4 is overridden elsewhere e.g coupled CH4)

param.name: radfor_scl_n2o
param.description: Scaling factor for N2O: scales baseline pre-industrial N2O of 275 ppb (unless N2O is overridden elsewhere e.g coupled N2O)

param.name: extra1a
param.description: Atlantic to Pacific freshwater flux adjustment Latutude band j=9,12 (36x36 grid, exercise caution for other grids) Total adjustment = extra1a+extra1b+extra1c (Sverdrups)

param.name: extra1b
param.description: Atlantic to Pacific freshwater flux adjustment Latutude band j=13,25 (36x36 grid, exercise caution for other grids) Total adjustment = extra1a+extra1b+extra1c (Sverdrups)

param.name: extra1c
param.description: Atlantic to Pacific freshwater flux adjustment Latutude band j=26,36 (36x36 grid, exercise caution for other grids) Total adjustment = extra1a+extra1b+extra1c (Sverdrups)

param.name: scl_fwf
param.description: i Scales the total Atlantic to Pacific freshwater flux Applied uniformly to extra1a, extra1b and extra1c

param.name: tdata_varname
param.description: variable name of temperature data for error calc

param.name: tdata_missing
param.description: massing value used in temperature data for error calc

param.name: tdata_scaling
param.description: conversion used in temperature data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): scaling

param.name: tdata_offset
param.description: conversion used in temperature data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): offset

param.name: qdata_varname
param.description: variable name of humidity data for error calc

param.name: qdata_missing
param.description: massing value used in humidity data for error calc

param.name: qdata_scaling
param.description: conversion used in humidity data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): scaling

param.name: qdata_offset
param.description: conversion used in humidity data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): offset

param.name: qdata_rhum
param.description: compare humidity data with relative humidity (.true.) or specific humidity (.false.) in error calc

param.name: atchem_radfor
param.description: use ATCHEM atmospheric tracer array to calculate radioative forcing (y/n)

param.name: diffa_len
param.description: zero/positive values: grid point distance over which scalar is applied (j direction); negative values: latitude of northward extent of area over which scalar is applied

param.name: delf2x
param.description: W m-2 for a CO2 doubling = delf2x * ln(2)

param.name: olr_adj0
param.description: Globally uniform, constant perturbation (REDUCTION) to clear skies OLR. This is equivalant to reducing b00 in the clear skies expression

param.name: olr_adj
param.description: adjustment to olr in surflux, for changing sensitivity

param.name: t_eqm
param.description: mean temp of control climate for changing sensitivity

param.name: aerofac
param.description: multiplicative factor to adjust tropospheric aerosols

param.name: volfac
param.description: multiplicative factor to adjust volcanic forcing

param.name: solfac
param.description: multiplicative factor to adjust changes in solar output

param.name: useforc
param.description: do we use a forcing file?

param.name: par_orbit_osctau0
param.description: really no-one knows what this is ...

param.name: orbit_radfor
param.description: use orbital parameters for albedo scheme (y/n)

param.name: par_albedo1d_name
param.description: Name of zonal planetary albedo file

param.name: orogswitch
param.description: switch (0/1/2) to take into account orography (=2: orography only affects surface processes)

param.name: t_orog
param.description: switch (0/1) to take into account time-varying orography

param.name: t_lice
param.description: switch (0/1) to take into account time-varying land ice sheet

param.name: lice_k9
param.description: k9 value (cf ENTS) for bucket capacity computation

param.name: t_d18o
param.description: switch 0(off)1(time varying)2(fixed) for benthic d18o derived ice sheets. Alternative to t_orog and t_lice

param.name: nd18o
param.description: number of inputs in d18o time series

param.name: d18osteps
param.description: interval (ocean timesteps) between d18o time series data points

param.name: d18o_k
param.description: constant for saturation of ice sheets (see Holden 2009 Clim Past Disc)

param.name: scale_mwfx
param.description: scaling for d18o icesheet meltwater (off = 0.0, default on = 1.5 (Holden 2009 Clim Past Disc)

param.name: filenamed18oicethresh
param.description: d18o ice covered threshold input filename

param.name: filenamed18oorogmin
param.description: d18o ice free orography input filename

param.name: filenamed18ooroggrad
param.description: d18o orography "gradient" wrt d18o input filename

param.name: ents_seasonswitch
param.description: switch (0/1) to take into account seasonal forcing fields

param.name: par_runoff_scheme
par_runoff_b
par_runoff_tau
param.description: if ea_par_runoff_scheme=3, this is the half-life of soil moisture in months

param.name: par_wind_polar_avg
param.description: option to bypass polar wind averaging in embm: 0 - As in March et al. 2011 (default). genie-wind is inconsistent with embm input method. 1 - Remove polar wind averaging of uatm on embm input winds. This makes the embm input winds compatible with the genie-wind module input winds. 2 - Removed polar wind averaging of usurf and on ENTS input winds.

param.name: unify_winds
param.description: uses embm input winds even with ents on. 0 - (default behaviour) ENTS modifies uatm and usurf winds. 1 - even with ENTS, use EMBM input winds for both uatm and usurf. 2 - even with ENTS, use embm uatm, but replace usurf with ENTS usurfl

param.name: nafter
param.description: file output frequency in PLASIM timesteps

param.name: ndiag
param.description: screen output frequency in PLASIM timesteps

param.name: ngenie
param.description: 1=pass genie variables to plasim 0=plasim does not see genie untested - use 0 with caution

param.name: kick
param.description: add noise during initialisation? 0=no 1=white noise 2=white noise symmetrical about equator

param.name: mars
param.description: shortcut for mars simulation untested and probably not working in plasim-genie left in for possible development

param.name: mvelp
param.description: longitude of moving vernal equyinox (needs nfixorb=1)

param.name: rstdir_name
param.description: if there is a plasim_status file in this directory then plasim will restart from it

param.name: ngear_years_plasim
param.description: number of years of coupled simulation when AO gearing activated

param.name: atchem_couple
param.description: are carbon fluxes passed out of plasim (ents)?

param.name: co2
param.description: co2 concentration (if negative will read an annual time series)

param.name: co2filename
param.description: co2 concentration time series (read if co2 negative)

param.name: ntco2e
param.description: switch for time series emissions input

param.name: co2emitfilename
param.description: co2 emissions (GTC/yr) time series (read if ntco2e=1)

param.name: nradfor
param.description: switch for time series non CO2 forcing

param.name: radforfilename
param.description: non-CO2 radfor (W/m2) annual time series (read if nradfor=1)

param.name: acllwr
param.description: cloud long wave mass absorption coefficient

param.name: rcritmin
param.description: minimum crit rel hum for non conv clouds

param.name: nbiome
param.description: 1=yes, 2=dynamic vegetation but chnages not seen by climate (see initialised vegetation from e.g. restart)

param.name: k14
param.description: CO2 fertilization Michalis Menton half saturation

param.name: k18
param.description: base photosynthesis rate (VBP) units kgC m-2 s-1 (not yr-1 as standard ents)

param.name: k26
param.description: leaf-litter rate (LLR) units kgC m-2 s-1 (not yr-1 as standard ents)

param.name: igrid
param.description: igrid (0 = const dsinlat; 1 = const dlat; 2 = igcm)

param.name: npstp
param.description: frequency at which 'health checks' are written to the screen or named output file

param.name: iwstp
param.description: Restart period in timesteps. 500 gives output every 5 years, given nyear=100

param.name: itstp
param.description: frequency at which integral diagnostics are written (as time series)

param.name: ianav
param.description: length of time over which output is averaged (recommended minimum = 1 year for annual average)

param.name: yearlen
param.description: number of days per year goldstein

param.name: temp0
param.description: initial Southern hemisphere ocean temp (applied to all ocean grid boxes south of the equator in non-restart runs)

param.name: temp1
param.description: initial Norther hemisphere ocean temp (applied to all ocean grid boxes north of the equator in non-restart runs)

param.name: scf
param.description: scl_tau: scales the wind stress to drive correct gyre strengths. Plausible range 1 to 3 (dimensionless). Tuned values: 1.6674 (EnKF), 1.1841 (ACCPM), 1.3005 (NSGA-II)

param.name: hosing_trend
param.description: rate at which hosing flux is increased/decreased (Sv/kyr)

param.name: cmip_model
param.description: FW flux anom file (.mod = 3-char GCM identifier)

param.name: imld
param.description: ocean mixed layer scheme (0 = off; 1 = on)

param.name: mldpebuoycoeff
param.description: mixed layer - efficiency of buoyancy-forced mixing (0.15 used in SEA model)

param.name: mldketaucoeff
param.description: coefficient for wind-forced mixing (value of 2.5 from S Roudesli tuning in isolation)

param.name: mldwindkedec
param.description: e-folding depth-scale for decay of efficiency of wind-mixing (100.0 used in SEA model; 25.0 from S Roudesli tuning in isolation)

param.name: iediff
param.description: ocean diapycnal mixing scheme (0 = uniform; 1, 2 = variable)

param.name: ediffpow1
param.description: power law governing rate at which diffusivity increases with depth

param.name: ediffpow2
param.description: stratification dependent mixing (0 = none; 1 = constant energy; other values allowed)

param.name: ediffvar
param.description: scaling of mixing towards input file (0 = none; 1 = as input file; other values allowed)

param.name: tdata_varname
param.description: variable name of temperature data for error calc

param.name: tdata_missing
param.description: massing value used in temperature data for error calc

param.name: tdata_scaling
param.description: conversion used in temperature data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): scaling

param.name: tdata_offset
param.description: conversion used in temperature data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): offset

param.name: sdata_varname
param.description: variable name of salinity data for error calc

param.name: sdata_missing
param.description: massing value used in salinity data for error calc

param.name: sdata_scaling
param.description: conversion used in salinity data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): scaling

param.name: sdata_offset
param.description: conversion used in salinity data for error calc (will be used to calculate "data/scaling-offset"): offset

param.name: lin
param.description: ascii restart file name (if applicable) goldstein

param.name: diso
param.description: Toggle between isopycnal/diapycnal (.true.) and horizontal/vertical (.false.) mixing schemes

param.name: ssmaxsurf
param.description: Isopycnal slope limiting vertical flux due to isopycnal mixing. This is NOT a tunable parameter; reducing it is a quick fix for unwanted negative tracers

param.name: ssmaxdeep
param.description: Isopycnal slope limiting vertical flux due to isopycnal mixing.This is NOT a tunable parameter; reducing it is a quick fix for unwanted negative tracers. It is better to reduce ssmaxsurf than ssmaxdeep.

param.name: rst_reset_T
param.description: Reset ocean temperatures (and ignore restart values)?

param.name: igrid
param.description: igrid (0 = const dsinlat; 1 = const dlat; 2 = igcm)

param.name: npstp
param.description: frequency at which 'health checks' are written to the screen or named output file max, min and average of height, concentration, temperature and albedo of existing sea ice

param.name: iwstp
param.description: frequency at which restart files are written, in ocean timesteps

param.name: itstp
param.description: frequency at which integral diagnostics are written to time series files, in timesteps. 500 gives output every 5 years, given nyear=100

param.name: ianav
param.description: length of time over which output is averaged (recommended minimum = 1 year for annual average)

param.name: conserv_per
param.description: frequency at which total sea ice thermal energy and water content is calculated

param.name: yearlen
param.description: number of days per year seaice

param.name: maxalbice
param.description: maximum sea ice albedo used only in plasim coupling

param.name: scale_oheat
param.description: scale heat flux fom ocean to ice (uncertain MLD) used only in plasim coupling

param.name: impsic
param.description: implicit (.true.) or explicit (.false., default) transport scheme

param.name: par_sica_thresh
param.description: Threshold of fractional sea-ice cover for preventing further sea-ice addition by (ocean) advection

param.name: par_sich_thresh
param.description: Threshold of sea-ice thickness for preventing further sea-ice addition by (ocean) advection

param.name: ents_igrid
param.description: ents_grid igrid: 0 = const dsinlat; 1 = const dlat; 2 = igcm)

param.name: ents_npstp
param.description: frequency at which health checks are written to the screen or named output file

param.name: ents_iwstp
param.description: restart period, in timesteps. 500 gives output every 5 years, given nyear=100

param.name: ents_itstp
param.description: frequency at which integral diagnostics are written as time series

param.name: ents_ianav
param.description: length of time over which output is averaged recommended minimum = 1 year for annual average

param.name: ents_yearlen
param.description: number of days per year ents

param.name: topt
param.description: Optimal temperature. Eq 19 and Eq 20 Equation references from Williamson et al 2006 Ecol. Model.

param.name: k7
param.description: For albedo of snow covered vegetation (Eq 31)

param.name: k11
param.description: !CAREFUL! k11a in Williamson 2006. For temperature response of tropical vegetation (Eq 19)

param.name: k11a
param.description: !CAREFUL! k11b in Willamson 2006. For temperature response of boreal vegetation (Eq 20)

param.name: k12
param.description: temperature response of photosynenthesis (Eq 19 and Eq 20)

param.name: k14
param.description: VPC photosynthesis half saturation co2 fertilisation (Eq 16)

param.name: k17
param.description: VFC fractional vegetation dependence on Cveg (Eq 21)

param.name: atchem_update
param.description: Export land-atmosphere carbon fluxes to ATCHEM module

param.name: atchem_fert
param.description: Use atmospheric pCO2 values from ATCHEM rather than EMBM for CO2 fertilisation

param.name: opt_append_data
param.description: append data to output files on restart (if the same run - i.e. if output directory name (outdir_name) = restart directory name (rstdir_name))

param.name: par_output_years_file_0d
param.description: file containing years for 0D output to be generated (to screen and file)(only 2d is ouptut at the moment, using this file)

param.name: par_output_years_file_2d
param.description: file containing years for 2D output to be generated (to screen and file)

param.name: ctrl_misc_t_BP
param.description: Simulation time scale as years Before Present (i.e., count years down or up)

param.name: ctrl_misc_nobioupdate
param.description: Tracer update with no biological component

param.name: par_misc_brinerejection_jmax
param.description: Max j for sea-ice brine rejection

param.name: ctrl_misc_brinerejection_bgc
param.description: Include biogeochem in Sea-ice brine rejection?

param.name: par_misc_kmin_pipe
param.description: Min k for geoengineering ocean pipes!

param.name: ctrl_force_sed_closedsystem
param.description: Set dissolution flux = rain flux to close system?

param.name: ctrl_force_GOLDSTEInTS
param.description: Allow temperature / salinity forcing of climate?

param.name: ctrl_force_GOLDSTEInTSonly
param.description: Allow ONLY temperature / salinity forcing of climate?

param.name: ctrl_force_seaice
param.description: Replace internal fractional sea-ice cover field?

param.name: ctrl_force_CaCO3toPOCrainratio
param.description: Replace internal CaCO3:POC export rain ratio?

param.name: ctrl_force_POCdtoPOCrainratio
param.description: Replace internal POCd:POC export rain ratio?

param.name: ctrl_force_scav_fpart_POC
param.description: Replace internal POC flux for 230Th and 231Pa isotope scavenging?

param.name: ctrl_force_scav_fpart_CaCO3
param.description: Replace internal CaCO3 flux for 230Th and 231Pa isotope scavenging?

param.name: ctrl_force_scav_fpart_opal
param.description: Replace internal opal flux for 230Th and 231Pa isotope scavenging?

param.name: ctrl_force_scav_fpart_det
param.description: Replace internal det flux for 230Th and 231Pa isotope scavenging?

param.name: par_gastransfer_a
param.description: Value of Wanninkhof [1992] gas transfer coeff (a)

param.name: ctrl_force_oldformat
param.description: Use old tracer forcing file format?

param.name: par_force_Fgeothermal2D_file
param.description: Filename for 2D geothermal heat input field

param.name: par_bio_k0_PO4
param.description: maximum PO4 consumption rate (mol kg-1 yr-1)

param.name: par_bio_k0_NO3
param.description: maximum NO3 consumption rate (mol kg-1 yr-1)

param.name: par_bio_c0_PO4_sp
param.description: [PO4] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_c0_PO4_nsp
param.description: [PO4] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- non-siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_c0_Fe_Diaz
param.description: [Fe] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) for diazotrophs

param.name: par_bio_c0_Fe_sp
param.description: [Fe] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_c0_Fe_nsp
param.description: [Fe] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- non-siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_c0_SiO2_sp
param.description: [H4SiO2] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_c0_SiO2_nsp
param.description: [H4SiO2] M-M half-sat value (mol kg-1) -- non-siliceous phytoplankton [Ridgwell, 2001]

param.name: par_bio_relprod_sp
param.description: Fractional production of siliceous phytoplankton in Si/Fe-replete conditions. The default value of 0.952381 orresponds to a ratio of 20:1 for siliceous to non-siliceous phytoplanktion production (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: par_bio_kT0
param.description: coefficient for temperature-dependent uptake rate modifier

param.name: par_bio_kT_eT
param.description: e-folding temperature (K) for T-dep. uptake rate modifier

param.name: par_bio_red_PC_flex
param.description: C/P organic matter fixed or flexible stoichiometry

param.name: par_bio_red_PC_alpha1
param.description: scaling of C/P organic matter flexible stoichiometry

param.name: par_bio_red_PC_alpha2
param.description: offset of C/P organic matter flexible stoichiometry

param.name: par_bio_red_PC_max
param.description: maximum C/P (1.8182e-02 == 1.0/55.0 -- see Galbraith and Martiny, 2015)

param.name: par_bio_red_DOMfrac
param.description: production fraction of dissolved organic matter

param.name: par_bio_red_RDOMfrac
param.description: production fraction of R-dissolved organic matter

param.name: ctrl_bio_red_ALKwithPOC
param.description: Tie ALK with POC (rather than POP)?

param.name: ctrl_bio_red_O2withPOC
param.description: Tie O2 with POC (rather than POP)?

param.name: par_bio_red_POC_CaCO3_pP
param.description: exponent for modifier of CaCO3:POC export ratio

param.name: par_bio_red_POC_CaCO3_CO3REF
param.description: Barker et al. [2003] CO3 reference conc (umol kg-1)

param.name: par_part_red_opal_FeTKSp
param.description: Ridgwell [2001] -- opal:POC KSp for FeT (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_part_red_opal_FeToff
param.description: Ridgwell [2001] -- opal:POC offset for FeT (mol kg-1)

param.name: opt_bio_red_SitoC
param.description: opal:POC rain ratio option ID string

param.name: par_bio_remin_RDOMfrac
param.description: Fraction of POM remin concverted to RDOM

param.name: par_bio_remin_AER_Km_O2
param.description: Aerobic methanotrophy O2 half sat constant (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_AER_dG0
param.description: Std Gibbs free energy of AER (kJ mol-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_AOM_kAOM
param.description: AOM rate constant (yr-1) (see also Olson et al., 2016)

param.name: par_bio_remin_AOM_Km_SO4
param.description: AOM SO4 half sat constant (mol kg-1) [Olson et al., 2016]

param.name: par_bio_remin_AOM_dG0
param.description: Std Gibbs free energy of AOM (kJ mol-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_Rgas
param.description: Gas constant for thermo calculations (kJ K-1 mol-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_frac2
param.description: initial fractional abundance of POC component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_dfrac2
param.description: Range in initial fractional abundance of POC component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_c0frac2
param.description: Half-sat (PO4) of initial fractional abundance of POC component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_CaCO3_frac2
param.description: initial fractional abundance of CaCO3 component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_opal_frac2
param.description: initial fractional abundance of opal component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_sinkingrate
param.description: prescribed particle sinking rate (m d-1) [OLD PARAMETER NAMES]

param.name: par_bio_remin_sinkingrate_scav
param.description: sinking rate (for calculating scavenging) (m d-1) [OLD PARAMETER NAMES]

param.name: par_bio_remin_sinkingrate_physical
param.description: Explicit physical particle sinking rate (m d-1) [NEW PARAMETER NAMES (disabled by zero)]

param.name: par_bio_remin_sinkingrate_reaction
param.description: Implicit sinking rate for geochem reactions (m d-1) [NEW PARAMETER NAMES (disabled by zero)]

param.name: par_bio_remin_ballast_kc
param.description: Organic matter carrying capacity of CaCO3

param.name: par_bio_remin_ballast_ko
param.description: Organic matter carrying capacity of opal

param.name: par_bio_remin_ballast_kl
param.description: Organic matter carrying capacity of lithogenics

param.name: par_CaCO3ballastcoeff_file
param.description: Filename for CaCO3 ballast coefficient field

param.name: par_opalballastcoeff_file
param.description: Filename for opal ballast coefficient field

param.name: par_detballastcoeff_file
param.description: Filename for det ballast coefficient field

param.name: ctrl_bio_remin_ONtoNH4
param.description: aerobic remineralization of ON -> NH4 (not NO3)?

param.name: ctrl_bio_remin_reminfix
param.description: Catch mis-behaving rapidly-oxidizing species going less than 0.0?

param.name: ctrl_Os_scav_O2_dep
param.description: switch to turn on O2 dependency of Os scavenging

param.name: par_scav_Os_O2_threshold
param.description: O2 threshold for O2-dependent Os scavenging [mol/kg]

param.name: ctrl_bio_remin_thresh
param.description: Apply a hard tracer oxidant remin threshold?

param.name: par_bio_remin_cthresh_O2
param.description: Hard threshold for oxic remin (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_cthresh_FeOOH
param.description: Hard threshold for FeOOH reduction (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_cthresh_SO4
param.description: Hard threshold for sulphate reduction (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_eL0
param.description: e-folding depth of smallest ecogem size class (m)

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_size0
param.description: diameter of smallest ecogem size class (um)

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_eta
param.description: exponent relating e-folding depth to ecogem size class [Stemmann et al 2004]

param.name: par_bio_remin_c0_FeOOH
param.description: Half-saturation for FeOOH reduction (mol kg-1) [RANDOM DEFAULT]

param.name: par_bio_remin_c0_SO4
param.description: Half-saturation for sulphate reduction (mol kg-1) [Olson et al, 2016]

param.name: par_bio_remin_ci_FeOOH
param.description: FeOOH reduction inhibition constant (mol kg-1) [RANDOM DEFAULT]

param.name: par_bio_remin_kH2StoSO4
param.description: Oxidation rate constant for H2S -> SO4 :: -d[H2S]/dt = k1[H2S][O2] [6e8 M-1 yr-1; Jourabchi et al., 2005] [3e8 M-1 yr-1; Boudreau, 1996] [5.4e7 M-1 yr-1; Romaniello and Derry, 2010] [3.65E6 Ozaki and Tajika, 2011] [0.81E6 M-1 yr-1 :: ln k1 = 0.44 @ 212 uM O2 == 1.55 M-1 min-1; Zhang and Millero, 1993]

param.name: par_bio_remin_kH2StoPOMS
param.description: Reaction rate constant for H2S -> POMS

param.name: ctrl_scav_H2S_dt_old
param.description: Old local residence time in layer for H2S?

param.name: par_bio_remin_kNH4toNO2
param.description: Oxidation rate constant for NH4 -> NO2

param.name: par_bio_remin_kNO2toNO3
param.description: Oxidation rate constant for NO2 -> NO3

param.name: par_bio_remin_cNH4_NH4toNO2
param.description: NH4 half-saturation for for NH4 -> NO2

param.name: par_bio_remin_cO2_NH4toNO2
param.description: O2 half-saturation for for NH4 -> NO2

param.name: par_bio_remin_cNO2_NO2toNO3
param.description: NO2 half-saturation for for NO2 -> NO3

param.name: par_bio_remin_cO2_NO2toNO3
param.description: O2 half-saturation for for NO2 -> NO3

param.name: par_bio_remin_cNO2_NO2toN2O
param.description: NH4 half-saturation for for NO2 -> N2O

param.name: par_bio_remin_cO2_NO2toN2O
param.description: O2 half-saturation (inhibition) for for NO2 -> N2O

param.name: par_bio_remin_fracN2O
param.description: Fraction of NH4 oxidation -> N2O (rather than NO2)

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_b
param.description: b value for Popp et al. fractionation

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_ef
param.description: Fractionation for intercellular C fixation (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_ef_sp
param.description: Fractionation for intercellular C fixation of siliceous phytoplankton (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_ef_nsp
param.description: Fractionation for intercellular C fixation of non-siliceous phytoplankton (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: par_d30Si_opal_epsilon
param.description: Fractionation of 30Si during opal formation by diatoms. Default value: -1.1 o/oo (De La Rocha et al., 1997, Geochim. Cosmochim. Acta)

param.name: opt_bio_foram_p_13C_delta
param.description: Planktic foram 13C fractionation scheme ID string

param.name: par_d44Ca_CaCO3_epsilon
param.description: 44/40Ca fractionation between Ca and CaCO3 for forams -- from Holmden et al. [2012], also similar to coccolith calcite [Langer et al., 2007]

param.name: par_d88Sr_SrCO3_epsilon
param.description: 88/86Sr fractionation between Sr and SrCO3 -- modified from Vollstaedt et al. [2014] (87/86Sr fractionation is simply half as large)

param.name: par_det_Fe_sol_exp
param.description: exponent for aeolian Fe solubility [use 1.0 for uniform solubility]

param.name: ctrl_bio_Fe_fixedKscav
param.description: Fixed scavening rate (if not: Parekh scheme)?

param.name: par_scav_fremin
param.description: Fraction of scavenged Fe that can be remineralized

param.name: ctrl_bio_NO_fsedFe
param.description: Prevent return of Fe from the sediments?

param.name: par_K_FeL_pP
param.description: log10 of Fe ligand stability constant K'(FeL)

param.name: ctrl_bio_red_Ridgwell2001FetoC
param.description: Use Ridgwell [2001] sp and nsp Fe:C functions?

param.name: par_bio_mu1
param.description: mu-1 maximum rate of export production (yr-1)

param.name: par_bio_mu2
param.description: mu-2 maximum rate of export production from N2-fixation (yr-1)

param.name: par_bio_N2fixthresh
param.description: threshold NO3+NH4 to encourage N2 fixation (mol kg-1)

param.name: par_bio_NPdiaz
param.description: N:P elemental ratio of nitrogen fixers (mol:mol)

param.name: par_bio_N2fixdyn
param.description: constant for the dynamical threshold to encourage N2 fixation

param.name: par_nitri_mu
param.description: NH4 oxidation rate constant (yr-1); up to 50 yr-1 [Yool et al., 2011]

param.name: par_nitri_c0_NH4
param.description: NH4 half-saturatation constant for NH4 oxidation (mol kg-1, 10-100 [Martens-Habbena])

param.name: par_nitri_c0_O2
param.description: O2 half-saturatation constant for NH4 oxidation (mol kg-1, 4-20 [Martens-Habbena])

param.name: par_bio_remin_kItoIO3
param.description: Oxidation rate constant for I -> IO3 (yr-1) [6 yr-1 from Fennel et al. [2005] in the case of NH4]

param.name: par_bio_remin_kIO3toI
param.description: Reduction rate constant for IO3 -> I (yr-1) [MADE UP DEFAULT]

param.name: par_bio_remin_cO2_ItoIO3
param.description: O2 half-saturation for for I -> IO3 (mol kg-1) [2.0E-05 mol kg-1 from Fennel et al. [2005] in the case of NH4]

param.name: par_bio_remin_cO2_IO3toI
param.description: O2 half-saturation for IO3 -> I (mol kg-1) [MADE UP DEFAULT]

param.name: par_bio_remin_cIO3_IO3toI
param.description: IO3 half-saturation for IO3 -> I (mol kg-1) [MADE UP DEFAULT]

param.name: par_bio_CaCO3precip_exp
param.description: Rate law power for CaCO3 precipitation

param.name: par_bio_FeCO3precip_sf
param.description: kinetic factor for FeCO3 precipitation in M yr-1

param.name: par_bio_FeCO3precip_exp
param.description: Rate law power for FeCO3 precipitation

param.name: par_d56Fe_FeCO3_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe in FeCO3 precipitation

param.name: par_FeOOH_Fethresh
param.description: dissovled Fe threshold for FeOOH precipitation

param.name: par_bio_remin_kFetoFe2
param.description: kinetic constant for Fe reduction using sulphide in M^(-1/2) yr-1

param.name: par_bio_remin_kFeOOHtoFe2
param.description: kinetic constant for FeOOH reduction using sulphide in M^(-1/2) yr-1

param.name: par_d34S_Fered_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe during Fe2 reoxidation

param.name: par_d56Fe_Fered_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe during Fe2 reoxidation

param.name: par_d56Fe_FeOOH_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe during FeOOH precipitation

param.name: par_bio_remin_kFe2toFe
param.description: kinetic constant for Fe2 re-oxidation in M-1 yr-1

param.name: par_d56Fe_Fe2ox_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe during Fe2 reoxidation

param.name: par_bio_FeS_exp
param.description: Rate law power for FeS formation

param.name: par_bio_FeS_part_abioticohm_cte
param.description: Ohmega constant for nanoparticulate FeS formation

param.name: par_bio_FeS2precip_k
param.description: kinetic constant for FeS2 precipitation in M-1 yr-1

param.name: par_k_lim_pyr
param.description: MM type limiting factor for FeS2 precipitation [was: K_lim_PYR]

param.name: par_d56Fe_FeS2_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d56/54 Fe in FeS2 precipitation

param.name: par_d34S_FeS2_alpha
param.description: fractionation factor d34/32 S in FeS2 precipitation

param.name: par_pindir_name
param.description: alternative data input directory (zero length by default -- this is detected)

param.name: ctrl_data_save_slice_fairsea
param.description: time-slice data save: Air-sea gas exchange (2D)?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_slice_carb
param.description: time-slice data save: Aqueous carbonate system properties (3D)?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_slice_carbconst
param.description: time-slice data save: Aqueous carbonate system constants (3D)?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_slice_phys_atm
param.description: time-slice data save: Atmospheric physical properties (2D)?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_slice_phys_ocn
param.description: time-slice data save: Ocean physical properties (3D)?

param.name: par_data_save_slice_n
param.description: Number of timesteps in sub-inteval (e.g., monthly) saving

param.name: ctrl_data_save_sig_fairsea
param.description: time-series data save: Air-sea gas exchange?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_sig_ocn_sur
param.description: time-series data save: Ocean surface tracers?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_sig_carb_sur
param.description: time-series data save: Ocean surface carbonate chemistry?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_3d_sig
param.description: Save high res 3D data (@ time-series frequency)?

param.name: ctrl_data_save_ocn_3D_ij
param.description: Save 3D data for a particular ij location?

param.name: par_data_save_level
param.description: Degree of comprehensivity of data saving

param.name: opt_append_data
param.description: append data to output files on restart (if the same run - i.e. if par_outdir_name = par_rstdir_name) (.FALSE./.TRUE.)

param.name: par_t_sig_count_N
param.description: Integration count for snap-shot savin -- 12 is approx June 21 for 24 BIOGEM time-steps per year

param.name: par_t_sig_count_S
param.description: Integration count for snap-shot savin -- 24 is approx Dec 21 for 24 BIOGEM time-steps per year

param.name: par_sig_j_N
param.description: Generic N j value (for time-series data saving) -- 17 is approx 65N for a 18x18 grid

param.name: par_sig_j_S
param.description: Generic S j value (for time-series data saving) -- 2 is approx 65S for a 18x18 grid

param.name: par_misc_save_i
param.description: i location for water column timeseries saving

param.name: par_misc_save_j
param.description: j location for water column timeseries saving

param.name: par_misc_audit_relerr
param.description: threshold of relative inventory change to trigger audit error

param.name: par_force_point_i
param.description: i coordinate of point forcing (0 = DISABLED)

param.name: par_force_point_j
param.description: j coordinate of point forcing (0 = DISABLED)

param.name: par_force_point_k
param.description: k coordinate of point forcing (0 = DISABLED)

param.name: ctrl_force_ohmega_calcite
param.description: Calcite saturation as the saturation target?

param.name: par_force_invert_fCorgburial
param.description: Scaling C burial flux relative to emissions

param.name: par_atm_F14C
param.description: Global cosmogenic production rate of 14C (mol yr-1)

param.name: par_atm_slabbiosphere_C
param.description: Initial terrestrial biosphere inventory (mol) [2300 PgC == 1.92E17 mol]

param.name: par_atm_FterrCO2exchange
param.description: CO2 exchange flux with terrestrial biosphere (mol yr-1) [120 PgC yr-1 == 1.0E16 mol yr-1

param.name: par_pindir_name
param.description: alternative data input directory (zero length by default -- this is detected)

param.name: par_sed_poros_CaCO3
param.description: carbonate porosity in top layer (cm3(pore water) / cm3(sed))

param.name: par_sed_Dmax_neritic
param.description: Maximum depth of shallow water sediments (m)

param.name: ctrl_sed_neritic_reef_force
param.description: Force reef occurrence regardless of ocean depth?

param.name: par_n_sedcore_tot_perky
param.description: Number of dimensioned sedcore layers per ka of runtime

param.name: n_sed_tot_drop
param.description: # sedimentary stack sub-layers to drop off bottom

param.name: par_sed_fdet
param.description: prescribed (additional) flux of detrital material to the seds (g cm-2 kyr-1)

param.name: ctrl_sed_bioturb_Archer
param.description: Use Archer et al. [2002] bioturbation scheme?

param.name: par_sed_mix_k_sur_max
param.description: maximum surface bioturbation mixing rate (cm2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_mix_k_sur_min
param.description: maximum surface bioturbation mixing rate (cm2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_dyerestart_n
param.description: Taged restart CaCO3 depth in layers (n)

param.name: par_sed_diagen_fracC2Ppres_ox
param.description: Fraction of P relative to C buried -- oxic

param.name: par_sed_diagen_fracC2Ppres_anox
param.description: Fraction of P relative to C buried -- anoxic

param.name: par_sed_diagen_fracC2Ppres_eux
param.description: Fraction of P relative to C buried -- euxinic

param.name: ctrl_sed_huelse2017_remin_POP
param.description: Force complete return of PO4 to ocean in HUELSE 2017 scheme

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_remove_impl_sulALK
param.description: Remove implicit Alk associated with buried sulf-OM?

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_sim_P_loss
param.description: Simulate ocean Porg loss with buried sulf-OM?

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_sim_P_loss_pres_fracC
param.description: Simulate ocean Porg loss related to Corg burial

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_k1
param.description: global labile Corg degradation rate constant, units of 1/yr

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_k2
param.description: global labile Corg degradation rate constant, units of 1/yr

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_k2_order
param.description: refractory Corg deg. rate order compared to labile

param.name: par_sed_huelse2017_k2_anoxic
param.description: refractory Corg deg. rate order compared to labile

param.name: par_sed_CaCO3_abioticohm_min
param.description: Min threshold for abiotic CaCO3 precipitation

param.name: par_sed_CaCO3burial
param.description: Prescribed CaCO3 production rate (mol cm-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_CaCO3burialTOT
param.description: Prescribed global CaCO3 production rate (mol yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_SrCO3recryst
param.description: Prescribed SrCO3 recrystlization rate (mol cm-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_SrCO3recrystTOT
param.description: Prescribed global SrCO3 recrystlization rate (mol yr-1)

param.name: par_r87Sr_SrCO3recryst
param.description: r87Sr of recrystalizing SrCO3 [Payton et al.]

param.name: par_d88Sr_SrCO3recryst
param.description: d88Sr of recrystalizing SrCO3 [Payton et al.]

param.name: par_sed_Corgburial
param.description: Prescribed Corg production rate (mol cm-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_CorgburialTOT
param.description: Prescribed global Corg production rate (mol yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_Corgburial_Dd13C
param.description: POC d13C offset compared to the d13C of CaCO3

param.name: ctrl_sed_Corgburial_fixedD13C
param.description: Set fixed d13C fractionation of Corg w.r.t. CaCO3?

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_ef
param.description: Fractionation for intercellular C fixation (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: opt_sed_foram_b_13C_delta
param.description: Benthic foram 13C fractionation scheme ID string

param.name: par_d44Ca_CaCO3_epsilon
param.description: coral 44/40Ca fractionation between Ca and CaCO3 (aragonite) -- from Holmden et al. [2012]

param.name: par_bio_red_CaCO3_SrCO3_alpha
param.description: neritic carbonate partition coefficient (alpha) [Stoll and Schrag [1998]]

param.name: par_d88Sr_SrCO3_epsilon
param.description: 88/86Sr fractionation between Sr and SrCO3 -- modified from Vollstaedt et al. [2014]

param.name: par_sed_lowTalt_fLi_alpha
param.description: Li low temperature alteration sink (mol yr-1) (Li/Ca normalized)

param.name: par_sed_lowTalt_7Li_epsilon
param.description: Li low temperature alteration sink 7Li epsilon (o/oo)

param.name: par_sed_clay_fLi_alpha
param.description: Li clay formation sink (mol yr-1) (Li/Ca normalized)

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fCa
param.description: hydrothermal Ca flux (mol yr-1) -- 2.0E12 in Blattler et al. [2011] but set to zero here as a default

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fCa_d44Ca
param.description: hydrothermal Ca flux d44Ca (o/oo) -- default from Blattler et al. [2011]

param.name: par_sed_lowTalt_fCa_alpha
param.description: Ca low-T alteration sink (mol yr-1) (Ca/Mg norm)

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fMg
param.description: hydrothermal Mg flux (mol yr-1) -- should normally be equal and opposite in sign to Ca flux

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fSr
param.description: hydrothermal Sr flux (mol yr-1) [Payton et al.; Davis et al. (2003)]

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fSr_r87Sr
param.description: hydrothermal Sr flux r87Sr (87/86) [Payton et al.; Davis et al. (2003)]

param.name: par_sed_hydroip_fSr_d88Sr
param.description: hydrothermal Sr flux d88Sr (o/oo) [Payton et al.; Pearce et al., (2015)]

param.name: par_sed_lowTalt_fSr_alpha
param.description: Sr low-T alteration sink (scaled to give a global modern total of 15.0E9 mol yr-1) [Payton et al.]

param.name: par_sed_lowTalt_fCO2
param.description: CO2 low-T alteration (weathering) sink (mol yr-1) (0.5E12 in Payton et al.)

param.name: par_sed_Os_depTOT
param.description: Os deposition rate under oxic conditions (mol yr-1)

param.name: ctrl_sed_Os_O2
param.description: switch for turning on oxygen-dependent Os deposition

param.name: par_sed_Os_O2_threshold
param.description: [O2] threshold for switching from oxic to suboxic Os deposition (mol)

param.name: par_sed_Os_dep
param.description: Os deposition rate under oxic conditions (mol m-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_Os_dep_oxic
param.description: Os deposition rate under oxic conditions (mol m-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_sed_Os_dep_suboxic
param.description: Os deposition rate under suboxic conditions (mol m-2 yr-1)

param.name: ctrl_sed_forcedohmega_ca
param.description: Ca-only adjustment for forced ocean saturation?

param.name: par_sed_ohmegamin_flux
param.description: imposed sed->ocn flux (mol Ca cm-2 per time-step) for saturation

param.name: par_pindir_name
param.description: alternative data input directory (zero length by default -- this is detected)

param.name: par_sed_reef_mask_name
param.description: Shallow water sediment (coral reef) mask name

param.name: par_output_years_file_0d
param.description: file containing years for 0D output to be generated (to summary file)

param.name: par_output_years_file_2d
param.description: file containing years for 2D output to be generated (to netcdf/ascii)

param.name: par_sed_Fdet_name
param.description: Alt detrital burial flux field file name

param.name: par_sed_Fcaco3_name
param.description: Alt CaCO3 burial flux field file name

param.name: par_sed_Fopal_name
param.description: Alt opal burial flux field file name

param.name: ctrl_force_sed_closedsystem_CaCO3
param.description: Set dissolution flux = rain flux for CaCO3 ONLY?

param.name: ctrl_force_sed_closedsystem_opal
param.description: Set dissolution flux = rain flux for opal ONLY?

param.name: ctrl_append_data
param.description: append data to output files on restart (if the same run - i.e. if sg_par_outdir_name = sg_par_rstdir_name) (.FALSE./.TRUE.)

param.name: ctrl_data_save_wtfrac
param.description: Report sediment data as a mass fraction?

param.name: par_misc_debug_i
param.description: i sediment coordinate for debug reporting

param.name: par_misc_debug_j
param.description: j sediment coordinate for debug reporting

param.name: par_sed_age_save_dt
param.description: Threshold of accumulated time for sedcorenv save (yr)

param.name: par_pindir_name
param.description: alternative data input directory (zero length by default -- this is detected)

param.name: par_output_years_file_0d
param.description: file containing years for 0D output to be generated (to screen and file)

param.name: par_output_years_file_2d
param.description: file containing years for 2D output to be generated (to file)

param.name: opt_append_data
param.description: append data to output files on restart (if the same run - i.e. if rg_par_outdir_name = rg_par_rstdir_name) (.FALSE./.TRUE.)

param.name: routing_scheme
param.description: routing scheme to use: 1 = 'roof' routing using k1 file; 2 = intermediate using detailed map, but roof for stuff that ends up on genie land grid (about half) 3 = detailed scheme using only flux that reaches the ocean for 2 and 3, the coastal ocean flux is scaled to match the total number of genie land cells (minus antarctica, as that isn't included in the data)

param.name: topo
param.description: file containing basic (roof) river routing to read (k1 file)

param.name: routing
param.description: prefix of file containing detailed river routing to read (based on detailed topographic data) - suffix is grid dimensions (n_i_n_j.dat)

param.name: max_drain_cells
param.description: maximum number of ocean cells a single land cell routes to

param.name: opt_short_circuit_atm
param.description: short circuit atmosphere by not taking CO2 directly, instead have less DIC put into ocean.

param.name: opt_weather_CaCO3
param.description: global CaCO3 weathering scheme ID string ('BLAG','WalkerKasting')

param.name: opt_weather_CaSiO3
param.description: global CaSiO3 weathering scheme ID string ('Brady_approx','Brady_FULL','WalkerKasting','linear')

param.name: opt_weather_R_explicit
param.description: if true then R/R_0 is used rather than the 1 + 0.045(T-T_0) parameterisation from GEOCARB

param.name: opt_weather_R_Ca
param.description: CaCO3 weathering - runoff feedback (if either rg_opt_weather_R_Ca or rg_opt_weather_R_Si is .false. then 2D runoff feedback is effectively switched off.)

param.name: opt_weather_R_Si
param.description: CaSiO3 weathering - runoff feedback (if either rg_opt_weather_R_Ca or rg_opt_weather_R_Si is .false. then 2D runoff feedback is effectively switched off.)

param.name: opt_weather_P_explicit
param.description: if true then P/P_0 is used rather than the [2RCO2/(1+RCO2)]^0.4 parameterisation from GEOCARB

param.name: opt_weather_C_Si_bg
param.description: Distinguish between basalt and granite weathering?

param.name: par_beta
param.description: fractional power of explicit weathering-runoff dependence

param.name: par_ref_T0
param.description: weathering reference mean global land surface temperature (deg C)

param.name: par_ref_P0
param.description: weathering reference mean global land productivity (kgC m-2 yr-1)

param.name: par_ref_CO20
param.description: weathering reference mean atmospheric CO2 level (ppm)

param.name: opt_outgas_eq_Si
param.description: set volcanic outgassing equal to silicate weathering

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3
param.description: global silicate weathering rate (mol Ca2+ yr-1) [10.0E12]

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3b
param.description: basaltic silicate weathering rate (mol Ca2+ yr-1) [10.0E12]

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3g
param.description: granitic silicate weathering rate (mol Ca2+ yr-1) [10.0E12]

param.name: par_weather_CaCO3
param.description: global carbonate weathering rate (mol Ca2+ yr-1)

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3_fracFeS2
param.description: global silicate pyrite abundance; a reasonable value woudl be to assume an S:Si ratio in the crust of 420:270000, and all S is pyrite (FeS2), i.e. 0.5*420/270000 = 7.8E-4

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3_d44Ca
param.description: mean silicate d44Ca (o/oo) -- consistent with mean riverine weathering input of Blattler et al. [2011]

param.name: par_weather_CaCO3_d44Ca
param.description: mean carbonate d44Ca (o/oo) -- consistent with mean riverine weathering input of Blattler et al. [2011]

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3_fracSr
param.description: global silicate Sr abundance (as a proportion of [Ca+Mg]) [Wallmann]

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3b_fracSr
param.description: basaltic silicate Sr abundance (as a proportion of [Ca+Mg]) [Wallmann]

param.name: par_weather_CaSiO3g_fracSr
param.description: granitic silicate Sr abundance (as a proportion of [Ca+Mg]) [Wallmann]

param.name: par_weather_CaCO3_fracSr
param.description: global carbonate Sr abundance (as a proportion of [Ca(+Mg)]) [Wallmann]

param.name: par_weather_fracOs
param.description: mean Os:Ca2+ ratio of weathering flux

param.name: par_weather_Ca0PO41
param.description: global apatite weathering rate (mol PO4 yr-1) (NB: no Ca or ALK component)

param.name: par_weather_SiO2
param.description: global quartz weathering rate (mol Si yr-1)

param.name: par_data_T_0D
param.description: mean global land surface temperature (C) to calibrate to

param.name: par_data_R_0D
param.description: mean global runoff (mm/s) to calibrate to (417 from GKWM; 374.24 from GEM_CO2)

param.name: par_weather_fCaCO3_enh_nt
param.description: enhanced CaCO3 weathering total inventory -- as years x enhancement factor

param.name: par_weather_fCaSiO3_enh_nt
param.description: enhanced CaSiO3 weathering total inventory -- as years x enhancement factor

param.name: par_lith_data
param.description: name of lithological data set - corresponding to directory genie-rokgem/data/input/lithologies_par_lith_datapar_lith_data2par_lith_data3_036_036

param.name: par_lith_data2
param.description: name of lithological data set - corresponding to directory genie-rokgem/data/input/lithologies_par_lith_datapar_lith_data2par_lith_data3_036_036

param.name: par_lith_data3
param.description: name of lithological data set - corresponding to directory genie-rokgem/data/input/lithologies_par_lith_datapar_lith_data2par_lith_data3_036_036

param.name: truncate_to_land
param.description: truncate lithological maps to genie land-mask - if option is set to false than flux from land in genie ocean, goes direct to ocean

param.name: scale_to_landarea
param.description: scale lithological areas to total the land surface area (switch off if altering lithological areas e.g. for enhanced weathering)

param.name: calibrate_weath
param.description: calibrate 2D weathering - if .true. use values below

param.name: calibrate_weather_GKWM_CaCO3
param.description: calibratation value for 2D CaCO3 weathering for GKWM scheme - to avoid drift, set equal to (half of CaCO3 sediment burrial flux)/(original uncorrected flux) (e.g. 1.583 for spun-up model)

param.name: calibrate_weather_GEM_CO2_CaCO3
param.description: calibratation value for 2D CaCO3 weathering for GEM-CO2 scheme - to avoid drift, set equal to (half of CaCO3 sediment burrial flux)/(original uncorrected flux) (e.g. 1.178 for spun-up model)

param.name: calibrate_weather_GKWM_CaSiO3
param.description: alibration value for 2D CaSiO3 weathering for GKWM scheme - to avoid drift, set equal to (half of CaCO3 sediment burrial flux)/(original uncorrected flux) (e.g. 0.8548 for spun-up model)

param.name: calibrate_weather_GEM_CO2_CaSiO3
param.description: calibration value for 2D CaSiO3 weathering for GEM-CO2 scheme - to avoid drift, set equal to (half of CaCO3 sediment burrial flux)/(original uncorrected flux) (e.g. 0.8878 for spun-up model)

param.name: par_ref_T0_2D
param.description: land surface temperature (C) calibration file containing base pattern for calibration (model field is scaled by rg_par_data_T_2D divided by this if rg_opt_calibrate_T_2D=.true.)

param.name: par_ref_R0_2D
param.description: land surface runoff (mm/yr) calibration file containing base pattern for calibration (model field is scaled by rg_par_data_R_2D divided by this if rg_opt_calibrate_R_2D=.true.)

param.name: par_ref_P0_2D
param.description: land surface productivity (kgC m-2 yr-1) calibration file containing base pattern for calibration (model field is scaled by rg_par_data_P_2D divided by this if rg_opt_calibrate_P_2D=.true.)

param.name: par_data_T_2D
param.description: file containing weathering reference land surface productivity (mm/yr) data field to calibrate to

param.name: par_data_R_2D
param.description: rfile containing weathering reference land surface runoff (mm/yr) data field to calibrate to

param.name: par_data_P_2D
param.description: file containing weathering reference land surface productivity (kgC m-2 yr-1) data field to calibrate to

param.name: opt_weath_regimes
param.description: Apply orogeny mask, so that only active mountain building areas have interactive weathering (marked by a 2 on the landmask specified by rg_weath_regimes).

param.name: weath_regimes
param.description: File containging orogeny land mask for use with rg_opt_weath_regimes=.true. (see above)

param.name: ctrl_force_T
param.description: Force ecogem with a temperature field

param.name: ctrl_tdep_form
param.description: Name describing form of temperature dependence

param.name: ctrl_photosynth_form
param.description: Name describing form of photosynthesis equations

param.name: n_keco
param.description: Number of layers with living plankton.

param.name: c13trace
param.description: select to trace carbon13 in food web

param.name: amminhib
param.description: Ammonium inhibition of NO3 and NO2 uptake

param.name: alphachl_a
param.description: Initial slope of PI curve - intercept

param.name: alphachl_b
param.description: Initial slope of PI curve - exponent

param.name: ctrl_restrict_mld
param.description: restrict MLD for mean light calculation?

param.name: beta_graz_a
param.description: Fraction messy feeding to dissolved - max

param.name: beta_graz_b
param.description: Fraction messy feeding to dissolved - min

param.name: beta_graz_c
param.description: Fraction messy feeding to dissolved - midpoint vol.

param.name: beta_mort_c
param.description: Fraction mortality to dissolved - midpoint vol.

param.name: par_bio_remin_POC_frac2
param.description: initial fractional abundance of POC component #2

param.name: par_bio_remin_CaCO3_frac2
param.description: initial fractional abundance of CaCO3 component #2

param.name: par_bio_red_POC_CaCO3_pP
param.description: exponent for modifier of CaCO3:POC export ratio

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_b
param.description: b value for Popp et al. fractionation

param.name: par_d13C_DIC_Corg_ef
param.description: Fractionation for intercellular C fixation (Ridgwell, 2001, PhD. Thesis)

param.name: nsubtime
param.description: Number of ecogem timesteps per biogem timestep

param.name: ctrl_misc_t_BP
param.description: Simulation time scale as years Before Present (i.e., count years down or up)

param.name: par_ecogem_force_T_file
param.description: Input file for forcing temperature in ecogem

param.name: par_DpCO2_thresh
param.description: Threshold for convergence of CO2 repartitioning (atm)
